extension.description: Play Movies and TV shows from MovieFork.com. Initial Project forked from plugin.video.solarmovie.so.
extension.disclaimer: This Project is designed for xbmc v13.x originally and currently being kept up on one of the nightly xbmcc v13.x builds. It gets a slight bit of testing as I use it myself, a LOT, on a Windows 7 OS. Any other OS's / builds of xbmc have not be tested on yet, but I do feel free to try and test it out on them. Some parts of this addon may not be legal in your country of residence - please check with your local laws before installing. I take no responsibility for any problems this plugin might in any way, form, shape or size cause. This is project is for a LEARNING EXPERIANCE.

extension.description: Play Movies and TV shows from SolarMovie.so. Some of the Features: Custom Labels for Multiple-Folder Favorites, Libraries, Find Air-Dates, Search, Advance Search, Some Download compatibility.
extension.disclaimer: This Project is designed for xbmc v13.x originally and currently being kept up on one of the nightly xbmcc v13.x builds. extension.summary: The Anime [COLOR tan]Highway[/COLOR] is a 3rd Party Video Plugin for XBMC
extension.description: This plugin now handles videos from animeget.com, anime44.com, animeplus.tv, gooddrama.net, and more. I'm aware that GoodDrama isn't anime, but it was a simular site linked to by one or more of the others... so I tossed it into the plugin as well for you jdrama fans. I'm still learning with it comes to python and having the most basic of flaws throw trouble at me, so there's bound to be some features lacking as well as some extra code left in at times that may not have gotten cleaned up at release time.
extension.disclaimer: This Project is designed for xbmc v12.x originally and currently being kept up on one of the nightly xbmcc v13.x builds. It gets a slight bit of testing as I use it myself, a LOT, on a Windows 7 OS. Any other OS's / builds of xbmc have not be tested on yet, but I do feel free to try and test it out on them. I take no responsibility for any problems this plugin might in any way, form, shape or size cause. This is project is for a LEARNING EXPERIANCE.

extension.description: Play a wide selection of movies, tv-shows and live content from www.thedarewall.com. Now Includes Radio Stations thanks to The Highway and lots of custom graphics by o9r1sh.

extension.description: Download and install addons by The[COLOR tan]Highway[/COLOR]

extension.summary: Common caching api for xbmc plugins.

extension.description: This add-on is a basic IRC client for XBMC mediacenter. Internet Relay Chat (IRC) is a protocol for live interactive Internet text messaging (chat) or synchronous conferencing. It is mainly designed for group communication in discussion forums, called channels.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

addon.name: metahandler
addon.provider-name: Eldorado (inspired by anarchintosh, westcoast, daledude, t0mm0)

extension.summary: Collection of commonly used addon routines
extension.description: Collection of commonly used addon routines to simplify addon development.
Collection of common functionality for addons.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, June 2007

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
